text: Be Happy is an Indian Hindi-language dance drama film written and directed by Remo D'Souza. ==Overview== Produced by Lizelle Remo D'Souza under Remo Dsouza Entertainment Pvt Ltd, the film stars Abhishek Bachchan, Nora Fatehi, Nassar, Inayat Verma, Johnny Lever and Harleen Sethi. The film was released on 14 March 2025 on Amazon Prime Video. == Cast == == Production == The film was announced by Amazon Prime Video. Abhishek Bachchan, Nora Fatehi, Nassar, Inayat Verma, Johnny Lever and Harleen Sethi was cast to appear in the film. Principal photography of the film commenced in April 2023 in Ooty before being completed in June 2023. The trailer of the film was released on 3 March 2025. == Soundtrack == The music of the film is composed by Harsh Upadhyay with lyrics written by Pranav Vatsa. == References == == Other websites == * Be Happy on Amazon Prime Video * Category:2020s Indian movies
